EmailTemplate.description: Inform Customer that Invoice will follow by an email.
EmailTemplate.name: DS CPO Email Invoice Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia customer purchase order ready for invoice: Your reference:{!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.PO_number__c}/ Nokia reference: {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We are pleased to confirm that your purchase order number {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.PO_number__c} under agreement {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.Apttus_CMConfig__AgreementId__c} has been successfully processed. An invoice will be issued to {!Apttus_Config2__CustomerPurchaseOrder__c.Apttus_Config2__BillToAccountId__c} in accordance with the agreed terms.
